title: About Me
text:
Aspiring Data Scientist | Software Engineer | Full-stack Developer
📍 Rexburg, Idaho | Fluent in English & Spanish



Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
Brigham Young University - Idaho (Jan 2023 – Apr 2026)
- Cluster in Software Design (Algorithms, Modularization, Inheritance) - Certified in Computing Programming, IT Fundamentals, and Web Frontend
- Passionate about AI, Machine Learning, Large Language Models, and Data Science




Student Records and Registration Specialist
BYU–Idaho (Nov 2024 – Present)
- Advised 10+ students daily and reduced registration errors by 20%
- Optimized scheduling for 45+ office assistants
Team Lead – Food Services, Chick-fil-A
BYU–Idaho (Sep 2023 – Sep 2024)
- Managed peak operations with a 10-person team
- Onboarded and trained 10 new employees per semester
Operations Supervisor – LaarCourier / UPS
Ecuador (Jul 2019 – Jul 2022)
- Improved delivery efficiency by 25% through route optimization
- Led weekly inventory and logistics planning





Languages: Python, C#, C++, Rust

Databases: SQL

Web: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React Native

Specialties: AI, Process Automation, Leadership & Conflict Resolution






📧 mac22045@byui.edu

💼 LinkedIn

📁 Download My Resume

🐙 GitHub



“Striving to bridge the gap between software engineering and data-driven decision making.”

title: Joshua Macias’s CV
text:
Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering

 linkedin.com/in/joshua-macias-01655017a/ | LinkedIn Profile   Resume 



Senior Year at Brigham Young University Idaho. Certificates in Computing Programming, Software Design, Web Frontend, and IT Fundamentals.


HTML, CSS, Python, Databases, AI & Process Automation, and Video Production.



Software Testing, Cloud Databases, Aviation.




2023 - Now Brigham Young University Idaho Rexburg - Idaho





November 2024 - Present - Advised 10+ students daily with registration, course adjustments, and academic policies, reducing processing errors by 20%. - Resolved scheduling conflicts for 45 department office assistants, optimizing course arrangements and enhancing efficiency.



September 2023 - September 2024

Managed high-volume customer orders during peak hours, coordinating with a 10-person kitchen staff to maintain efficiency.
Trained and onboarded 10 new employees per semester in food safety and operational procedures.
Collaborated with recruitment teams across three departments to improve hiring and training processes.




July 2019 - July 2022

Conducted weekly inventory assessments to optimize operational efficiency.
Analyzed daily reports to prioritize new routes, improving delivery efficiency by 25%.







October 2016 - October 2018

Conducted and led monthly training sessions for 110+ volunteers, focusing on ethics, communication, and leadership.
Organized collaborative efforts with seven local nonprofits, facilitating food and clothing drives for underserved communities.
